2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Series finale This series final features the comics debut of QUEEN MYRRAH, leader of THE LOCUSTS! Leads readers into GEARS OF WAR 3 game!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Dirty Little Secrets, Part 6: No Hiding Place

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: It's mayhem on the streets of Manhattan! A relentless creature of fury and fire running amok! Only Haunt can save the city from an apocalyptic end! But at what cost? The new nightmare rolls on in 2012!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Kick-Ash!

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
CHANGE IS COMING

The virtual battle rages on, as Ikki and Team Kogarasumaru try to catch a special balloon floating through a fantastical computer-generated arena before their opponents. At stake is not only a priceless opportunity to compete in the Gram Scale Tournament, but the ability to show just how far they’ve come from their humble roots. And after the battle, a very surprising guest appears….

This volume of Air Gear includes special extras after the story!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Change Is Coming

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: As the mind-boggling 100-point alien boss unleashes its horrors upon the overmatched Osaka Gantz team, the Tokyo team is forced by the Gantz orb to join the battle, but even their numbers fail to turn the tide. When all hope seems lost, the legendary alien fighter Hachira Oka returns from exile and enters the battlefield with his fearsome arsenal of weapons. But if the mighty Oka falls to the shape-shifting monstrosity, could this be humanity’s last stand as well?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Volume 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The Devil's pact made in Circle of Four comes full circle as HELL-VENOM is unleashed! Can Flash Thompson regain his soul - or will he be in Damion Hellstrom's thrall forever? Meanwhile, ace reporter Katy Kiernan makes a devastating discovery about Venom!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Monsters of Evil, Part 2

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Four sisters, bound by love and magic, have had their lives turned upside down many times in the years since they first inherited their powers. Now, they must put aside their differences and work together to take back their world. The Charmed Ones will need to unleash the full strength of the magic that has been growing through their family line for centuries in an epic battle that will bring season nine to its earth-shattering conclusion.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Power of 300

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: It’s the second half of Shohoku’s debut game in the National Championship. Toyotama boasts the top three scorers from the Osaka regionals, and they’re bent on nothing less than crushing Shohoku! But Coach Anzai’s got a plan: steal the ball, run and score, facing Toyotama’s run-and-gun style head on! If Shohoku can’t beat Toyotama at their best game, what chance do they have of beating last year’s champion Sannoh in the next round?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The battle lines have been drawn! Dracula's horrific soldiers - and his new lieutenant - are on the offensive, but they'll have to get past Vampirella and her allies! The two-part HELL ON EARTH epic starts here! (And be sure to check out PANTHA #5 for even more of the story!)
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Hell On Earth, Part 1: Force Dispersal

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
"Archie Marries Veronica" - Change is afoot in Riverdale! After the devastating shooting of his partner, Kevin rethinks his risky career path while Clay recuperates. Kevin's not the only one with a career shift in mind as Veronica moves on from Lodge Industries and Riverdale's Mayor Moose contemplates making a political move to the senate. Plus, it's the premiere of Reggie and Betty's reality show at the Chok'lit Shoppe and Jughead is pulling out all the stops to make it a Hollywood-style event! In a night filled with excitement, Kevin has an announcement that will set the scene for many issues to come!

"Archie Marries Betty" - It's the reunion we've all been waiting for as The Archies reunite to help raise money for a worthy cause. Jellybean's unreliability comes to a head with older brother Jughead after the stress of Midge's pregnancy takes its toll. Conflicts aside, this issue is a can't-miss affair with Josie and the Pussycats making their Life with Archie debut as the headlining act for the grand opening of Archie's new music club.

Excel cannot long survive in the artificial body of Isshiki; the tragedy is that she has no incentive to leave it, as she’s finally the faultless servant of Lord Il Palazzo she’s dreamed of being. By contrast, Iwata seems to have made a recovery under Matsuya’s care—but in coming back to his old self, he tells her secrets beyond what a lover would. And Miwa makes her next move by revealing a few things her son has kept to himself. They say a little knowledge is dangerous—and if it’s in the hands of Umi...?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Batman's investigation into the missing taxidermy Barghast took a turn for the even-more-bizarre when he stumbled onto a living creature! Will he solve the mystery before he becomes extinct himself? "The Barghest" part 2 of 2.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Unnatural Selection, Part 2 of 2

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Batman puts an end to Fries and his ticking time bomb. But with that resolved, he must help Superman, Lois and Barbara fight back against the assassins. As the Detective arc winds down, alliances are solidified, secrets are revealed and even Lex has a change of heart!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Detective Part 12

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Eight years of Boundless Comics' LADY DEATH history has all been leading to this, the most defining moment of all time for the sultry, albino goddess! At last, the horrific nature of The Void is revealed, and once Agony is released from bondage, the repercussions of her true identity will change Lady Death forever. When the final truth is revealed, nothing... And we mean NOTHING will be the same!

Available with Regular cover by Jason Eden, Sultry cover by Renato Camilo, and Wraparound by Pow Rodrix with order incentive Art Deco cover by painter Michael Dipascale!

Who wouldn't want to play a video game starring The Archies? That's exactly what top video game developer Mr. Rockmore had in mind, so when the music group head to his offices to check out the game's progress, they come prepared with plenty of suggestions. If Rockmore's team can handle the band's improvements, it just might turn out to be 'The Ultimate Musical Videogame!'

"The Summoning" story arc continues here! Sela, Samantha and Red Riding Hood race to prevent the ritual from being completed, but even their combined powers may not be enough when the trio finds itself face to face with Cindy, the Sea Witch, Venus and the Beast!

Meanwhile, as Helios is finally set free on Earth, his uncontrollable power and rage will finally be unleashed. Don't miss the issue that begins the evolution of the Grimm Universe!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Summoning, Part 3 of 4

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Tom Judge knows the world around him is not the world that should exist. He also knows that Darkness bearer Jackie Estacado is responsible for perverting the universe. Tom is determined to confront Jackie to set things right, but first he will need Sara, bearer of the Witchblade, to back him up.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Fallen From Heaven

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Date Night!

Kitty and Iceman! Storm and Wolverine?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Ain't No Sin To Be Glad You're Alive

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Deadshot attempts assassination!

Batgirl fights alone against Match!

Kylstar decimates Superboy and the Justice League!

Nightwing's team fails against Brainiac!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Invasion, Chapter Five: Milburn, Edgar and Jake

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Draw! gets up-close and in the studio with illustrator Glen Orbik, as he demos how he creates his fully painted noir paperback and comic covers for Marvel, DC Comics, and others! Then we jump from comics to animation as Draw! interviews Robert Valley (pioneer of the cutting-edge psychedelic animation for Harmonix Music Systems' The Beatles: Rock Band music video). Plus there's the latest installment of Comic Art Bootcamp with editor Mike Manley and Bret Blevins, reviews of new art supplies by Crusty Critic Jamar Nicholas, and a Rough Critique of a newcomer's work by Bob McCloud!

Ever wanted to make a difference in your home town? Archie and friends can relate! Inspired to renovate the very first general store established in Riverdale, the gang all pitch in to refurbish the historical landmark. However, when a greedy businessman pulls the mayor's strings to have it condemned so he can turn a profit, publicity-savvy Veronica vows to get the media on their side to expose the corrupt deal and fight city hall in the process! Will they succeed in keeping Pickens General Store intact for future generations to enjoy?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: From the Ground Up

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Welcome to Little Atlantis, just another ethnic neighborhood in Seattle, except many of its residents need water to breathe and the hippest clubs are the ones that are submerged. Everyone's excited by a visit from Mera, Queen of Atlantis. Everyone, that is, except her sister Nautica, better known as the villainous Black Manta!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Mera, Queen of Atlantis

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
"FINAL," Part Five

Samhain pits the girls against each other in the ultimate battle to see who is the TRUE "Final Girl." Betrayals and beheadings galore as the penultimate chapter of "Final" arrives!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Final, Part Five

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Amanda survived crazy at the hands of the psychopath, Lorre. But the Livers are a new kind of insanity that threatens to push her narrow grasp on reality into the embrace of schizophrenia. With an army of Rat Crossed out to slurp her insides through a straw and three certified lunatics fighting over her, the only sane choice seems to be a bullet in the head.

Available with a Regular and Torture cover by Raulo Caceres, Wraparound cover by Gianluca Pagliarani, and a special Red Crossed Incentive also by Caceres.

NOTE: Indicia credits Miguel A. Ruiz as the interior artist.

NATURAL RESOURCES CONTINUES

The mutants have proved their worth, but at what cost?

Kitty makes a choice that could haunt her forever

Rising star, Mahmud Asrar (Supergirl) joins the creative team!

The X-Men are being attacked by police.

Two weeks earlier, Kitty, James and Storm explore the now green desert island of Utopia. They build homes there and more people are coming to join them.

Rogue enjoys the forest because it is life she can touch without danger.

Warpath and Psylocke also hide in the forest and discuss their plans.

Farbird reports to Karen Grant, telling her that it failed to locate the mutants because of the vegetation. She talks to Liz on the phone and asks her to call her "Jean Grey" from now on.

The mutants are working on their community and building things they need with all of their abilities.

Nomi practices her gun and phasing skills in the forest.

In Washington, D.C. politicians discuss how they can end the successes of the mutants soon.

Back in Utopia, Jimmy makes a deal with Warpath.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Natural Resources, Part One

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

Awakening Insects Chapter

  • 13. Guidance (導き michibiki)
  • 14. synchro
  • 15. Entrance (入り口 iriguchi)

Sea Chapter

  • 1. WHO (誰か dareka)
  • 2. WHY (なぜ naze)
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Fateful news about someone close to Daredevil!

Will Matt be forced to abandon his Daredevil identity?

June 6th, 1965. Samuel Victor Blute is thirteen years old in a time and place that doesn't give a damn about tender years or innocence. And over the course of one long and bloody summer's day, he makes the choice that will define him - and his family - for the rest of their lives.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: My father, the monster

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Felicity gets in over her head when a dreamy new colleague invites her to dinner...
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Diamond in the Rough

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
PREMONITIONS AND PROMOTIONS

Natsu and gang return to Earthland from Edolas, and back at home, it's time for the annual S-class wizard promotion test! The eight participants, including Natsu, choose partners and head for Tenrou Island, where Fairy Tail’s first master was laid to rest. Only one will pass! Who will join the magical elite?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 197: Bye-Bye Fairy Tail
  • Chapter 198: The Wings to Tomorrow
  • Chapter 199: Lisanna
  • Chapter 200: He Who Snuffs Out Life
  • Chapter 201: Trial
  • Chapter 202: Best Partner
  • Chapter 203: Eight Roads
  • Chapter 204: Who Is the Lucky One?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Premonitions and Promotions

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Dejah and Kantos Kan try to keep an upstart princess alive as they are hunted by a ruthless assassin in one of the most dangerous regions of Barsoom!

"Worlds Collide," Part One. The crossover event of 2013 starts here! The Mega Man/Sonic the Hedgehog epic kicks off with a bang as the Blue Blur and Blue Bomber meet for the first time! And considering how hard they're fighting each other, it might be the last! Why are the heroes trying to take each other down? Drs. Eggman and Wily know, and they're loving every minute of it! You cannot miss this historic first meeting of two of the biggest video game icons in the entire world! Get in on the ground floor with all-new cover art by the legendary Patrick "SPAZ" Spaziante, and choose your favorite hero with the "Team Sonic" and "Team Mega Man" variant covers!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: When Worlds Collide Part One: Kindred Spirits

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Proper Japanese Title: 葵螺旋城の闘い

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 203: The Night Before The Assault (突入前夜 Totsunyū Zen'ya)
  • Chapter 204: Revival (再誕 Saitan)
  • Chapter 205: An Ayakashi's Duty (妖の本分 Ayakashi no Honbun)
  • Chapter 206: Talent (才能 Sainō)
  • Chapter 207: Hyakki o Seoishi Mono (百鬼を背負いし者)
  • Chapter 208: Kōsasuru Shibu no Chi (交差する四分の血)
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Aoi Rasenjō no Tatakai

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
THE PULSE-POUNDING FINALE OF "RECONSTRUCTION"!

Ultimates vs. West Coast Ultimates!

Can America survive a super-powered battle royale?

A momentous decision changes the Ultimates -- and the country -- FOREVER!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Reconstruction, Part 6 of 6

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
John Carter is a prisoner of the brutal tyrant Salensus Oll. His princess is still in the clutches of the ever-sleazy Matai Shang. But Carter's a lucky guy! A friendly fleet is approaching Salensus Oll's domed fortress. There's just one little hitch: the ships are doomed if Carter can't escape and shut down the terrible Guardian of the North that renders Salensus Oll invincible. Even if he breaks free, Carter will have to face the guardian of the Guardian - the greatest swordsman Mars has ever known!

List of covers and their creators:

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Magnet Switch - Part 4 of 5

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Translates Avengers #28, Avengers Academy #31 and New Avengers #28.

Introducing Blackout, An all-new hero!

Step into the darkness with the brand-new Dark Horse superhero Blackout, written by Frank Barbiere with art by Micah Kaneshiro! Get ready for sci-fi action with the return of Ron Randall’s Trekker! Take the case and save the world with Donny Cates and Eliot Rahal’s Hunter Quaid! Plus, new installments of Alabaster: Boxcar Tales, Nexus, Crime Does Not Pay, Brain Boy, King’s Road, Bloodhound, and Villain House!

Story & Chapter Titles

  • Blackout: Strange Terrain - Chapter 1
  • Alabaster: Boxcar Tales - Chapter 6
  • Bloodhound: Plain Sight - Chapter 2
  • Brain Boy - Chapter 2
  • Trekker: The Train to Avalon Bay - Chapter 1
  • King's Road: The Long Way Home - Chapter 2
  • Crime Does Not Pay presents: City of Roses - Chapter 5
  • Nexus: Into the Past - Chapter 2
  • Hunter Quaid: Armageddon Outta Here!
  • Villain House - "Blind Mole-Rat King" - Chapter 4
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Blackout; Alabaster; Bloodhound; Brain Boy; Trekker; King's Road; City of Roses; Nexus; Hunter Quaid; Villain House

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The Justice League squares off against the nefarious Brain Trust and a new ally is revealed!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: In Gods We Trust, Part Three

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 209: Day of Resurrection
  • Chapter 210: I Am Me
  • Chapter 211: Assembly of the Gods
  • Chapter 212: Mitarashi Family
  • Chapter 213: The Devil's Grin
  • Chapter 214: Location of the Miracle
  • Chapter 215: The Flame of Imprisonment
  • Chapter 216: Firelit Shadow of Self-Denial
  • Chapter 217: The Determination Back Then!!
  • Chapter 218: The Vapricious Flame
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Batman continues his fight against the powerful Alloy while Max looks for a way to stop the madness!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Undercloud, Part Four: Metal and Men

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
"SPIDER-MAN NO MORE" CONTINUES

Can Miles return to Spider-Man after everything that's happened?

There's a new band of superheroes in town!

What is Ultimate Power Pack?!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Spider-Man No More, Part 2; Cloak and Dagger vs. Bombshell

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Millions are dying from the invading hordes of Apokolips. Superman is forced to remove any remaining inner restraints and unleashes a truly terrifying display of power.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Chapter 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Conan, now a warlord of Koth, is sent by his jealous and spiteful king on a doomed foray into the territory of bloodthirsty Kushite marauders. But greater perils await as Conan and his men again encounter Imhotep, demon from beyond the stars, who seeks Conan’s life and the enchanted amulet the barbarian carries. Collects Conan the Barbarian #182–#189 and Conan the Barbarian Annual #11.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Blood Dawn and Other Stories

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
With the hunt on for Leonardo, the remaining Turtles take whatever help they can get... but can they trust a truce with Old Hob?! A startling climax will change the Turtles forever!

List of Covers and their Creators

CoverCover NameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover AMateus Santolouco1
BCover BKevin Eastman4
RIRetailer Incentive CoverFreddie Williams III5
RERetailer Exlcusive - Jetpack Comics 1Kevin Eastman2
RERetailer Exclusive - Jetpack Comics 2?3
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: City Fall Part Three

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Angel and Faith will need all the help they can get when it comes to stopping this season's ubervillains from unleashing a magic-fueled plague on the earth. Enter an archmage, a former Watcher, and two socialites who’ve dabbled in magic . . . Will it be enough?

Final Arc!

Battle to the death!

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverSteve Morris1
VarVariant CoverRebekah Isaacs (a) & Dan Jackson (c)2
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: What You Want, Not What You Need Part Four

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The Tribes are still divided! The Wayfinder thingy has lead Ooga’s team to a temple in the desert where they suspect their missing companions are being held. But it’s guarded by some large hulking gem-powered constructs. Time to use that old Pygmy ingenuity and break them out! Hmmm…on second thought, maybe Kinsee and Nooby should just bust their own selves out! At least Klik’s group is safe in the Nest city of the Bird-people, right? Wait…there are mysterious goings-on there also? Well crud. Some days a pygmy just can’t get a break! And don’t peek ahead to the HUGE surprise on page 4! …But don’t worry if you do, the EVEN HUGE-ER surprise at the end of the story will completely blow your mind! The Pocket God Comic App is updated frequently with all kinds of FREE extras such as The Pygmy Peril newsletter (which includes free Little Green Men comic short stories), and an EXCLUSIVE re-mastered version of the first Pocket God animated short! And don’t forget that PYGMY PERIL #30 is available right NOW! And if you have already downloaded the App itself, then every issue of PYGMY PERIL is absolutely FREE! This issue of the ‘Peril is packed to the gills with the usual whacked-out Fan-Art, freaked-out Fan-Mail, and also the ‘Dangerous Dialog’ contest! And of course it closes out with those itty-bitty imbeciles of invasion, the LITTLE GREEN MEN!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Pygmies Strike Back Part 4 (of 5)

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: In a last-ditch effort to save Dawn, the heroic trio of Buffy, Willow, and Xander must split up and tackle their own demons, real and imagined. As the season’s Big Bads—Severin and Simone—threaten to turn back time, the mystical council partner with Koh and Illyria to prevent a tragic tear in the fabric of time!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Core Part Four

volume.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer Season Nine

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The adventures of Kirk, Spock and the Enterprise crew continue in an all-new adventure that follows the events of the hit film STAR TREK INTO DARKNESS and the new STAR TREK video game! A classic enemy returns in this story overseen by STAR TREK writer/producer Roberto Orci. Beware... THE GORN!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Gorn

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 103: War on the Moon II (Part 3) (第2次月面戦争（その3） Dai Ni-ji Getsumen Sensō (sono san))
  • Chapter 104: The Dark Side of the Moon I (ザダークサイドオブザムーン I Za Dāku Saido Obu Za Mūn I)

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Proper Japanese Title: 冥府の軍勢 (Meifu no Gunzei)

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 132: Those Free To Loiter (彷徨える者 "Samayoeru Mono")
  • Chapter 133: Resonance and Rally (共鳴と再会 "Kyōmei to Saikai")
  • Chapter 134: The Troops of Hades (冥府の軍勢)
  • Chapter 135: The Eyelid's Memory (瞼の記憶)
  • Chapter 136: Gnawing Malice (蝕む悪意)

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Meifu no Gunzei

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
A return to our classic legacy numbering just in time for a new set of Tavern Tales! Four short stories by top flight talent detailing the earlier adventures of our heroes.

Note: Even though it says Before Skullkickers on the cover the indicia reverts back to just Skullkickers.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Before Skullkickers: Four New Tavern Tales; Elvish Graces, Dagnabbit T' Hell, Choose Your Partner!, Dimensional Theory 101

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: In our greediest issue yet, Eugene Krabs, owner of the Krusty Krab and SpongeBob's penny-pinching boss, scuttles into the spotlight. First, Krabs hears of a mythical tree with dollar bills for leaves. To what ends will he go to possess this fiscal foliage? You, SpongeBob, and Squidward all find out in 'The Money Tree' by Graham Annable. For this issue's pin-up, former Air Pirates artist Gary Hallgren paints a giant Bikini Bottom dollar bill with Krabs himself in the presidential spot. Also, in 'Squidmund Visits,' Squidward's got company, so he must get his house's feng shui in order. But Squidward forgot to plan for one thing - or make that two things: one yellow, one pink! All this plus facts about sand dollars, Patrick's introduction to the 3-second rule, and an adorable back cover by Graham Annable!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Money Tree; Squidmund Visits

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Featuring Modesty Blaise by Peter O'Donnell and Romero. Color features include The Phantom, Mandrake the Magician, Flash Gordon by Mac Raboy, Gasoline Alley by Dick Moores, Tarzan by Russ Manning, Alley Oop by V. T. Hamlin, Steve Canyon by Milton Caniff, Casey Ruggles by Warren Tufts, plus in black and white: Flash Gordon by Dan Barry and Harry Harrison, Tarzan by Bob Lubbers, Krazy Kat by George Herriman, Buz Sawyer by Roy Crane, Sir Bagby by R&B Hackney, and Rick O'Shay by Stan Lynde.
The 99 issue #24!

She has recruited others who are sympathetic to her cause. She has risen to a position of power that will allow her to acquire everything she needs. She has waited patiently as all the pieces have fallen into place. And now the time has come for Margaret Carlisle to set her deadly plans in motion. When she's finished, there will be nothing left of O.S.I. or the Bionic Man. Issue 24 kicks off an epic grudge match you won't want to miss!

Proper Japanese Title: クッキングフェス"開幕 (Kukkingu Fesu Kaimaku!!)

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 208: Trying the Four Beasts!! (四獣、実食!! Shijū, Jisshoku!!)
  • Chapter 209: Chef Komatsu!! (料理人・小松!! Ryōrinin Komatsu!!)
  • Chapter 210: Nail Gun!! (ネイルガン!! Neiru Gan!!)
  • Chapter 211: Cooking Fest Opens!! ("クッキングフェス"開幕!! "Kukkingu Fesu" Kaimaku!!)
  • Chapter 212: The Contestants Appear!! (選手入場!! Senshu Nyūjō!!)
  • Chapter 213: The Preliminaries Start!! (予選開始!! Yosen Kaishi!!)
  • Chapter 214: Serious Battle!! (真剣勝負!! Shinken Shōbu!!)
  • Chapter 215: Branch Appears!! (ブランチ、見参!! Buranchi, Kenzan!!)
  • Chapter 216: Pulling Ahead!! (ごぼう抜き!! Gobō-nuki!!)
  • Extra: Shimabukuro Mitsutoshi x Kishimoto Masashi Special Talk
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Cooking Fest Kaimaku!!

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Batman’s final confrontation with The Wrath is here! Can Batman stop his evil counterpart from claiming any more victims as an epic battle bursts onto the city streets?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: State of Shock

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: At Batman’s direction Luke Fox takes off for Italy to compete in a Mixed Martial Arts tournament. He’s about to come face to face with Lady Vic and Charlie Caligula, so let’s hope he brought his newly modified Batwing armor!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: I Can't Catch a Break

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: After months away, Green Arrow returns to Seattle with new ally Shado at his side. But a furious Count Vertigo is hot on their tail! Plus, the city’s mysterious new crimelord is revealed!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Dissonance

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: “LIGHTS OUT” part one! Relic arrives on Oa as this massive story kicks off! Can the different Lantern Corps come together to stop this powerful enemy? Lights Out will see Lanterns die, others change allegiances—and nothing will be the same ever again! Trust us: We MEAN IT!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Lights Out, Part One: Dark Days

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The Seeder’s true identity is revealed, but what’s required of Alex in his role as Avatar of The Green becomes increasingly complex!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Seeder

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: When Brainiac shrunk Metropolis, they were infected in the process. Now, Superman battles their effects on the city—and the secrets of “The Twenty” are revealed!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Psi War, Part Two

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Secrets threaten to destroy Stormwatch! Midnighter and Apollo’s origin isn’t what it seems. Who is Storm Control? And what does new villain Extremax want with Earth?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Extremax

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
An 'Avengers vs X-Men' chapter! Thor confronts the Phoenix! Captain America versus Gambit! Spidey tackles Colossus!

By Brian Michael Bendis, Walt Simonson, Kieron Gillen and Steve McNiven

Featuring material first published in Avengers #25-26 and AVX #2.

Zero Year Part Four! In this amazing, double-sized issue, Batman is on the trail of the Red Hood Gang and their mysterious leader, secret origins are revealed, and a major surprise will change the course of Zero Year and Batman’s life!

Notes:

  • The New York Comic Con Variant cover is a homage of the cover of Detective Comics #27.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Zero Year: Dark City, Part One

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Who gets the last laugh? The Prankster vs. Nightwing!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Buyer's Remorse

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: “Batgirl: Wanted” part two! Chased by her father and the police, and ravaged with guilt over the death of her brother, Barbara has given up her Batgirl identity! But tonight she is forced to take to the streets—with deadly consequences!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Batgirl: Wanted, Part Two of Three: Dragnet

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: “LIGHTS OUT” part two! John Stewart must lead a group of GLs in a last-ditch effort to save Oa and protect the other Lanterns as they retreat from Relic’s attack!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Lights Out, Part Two: Oa's Last Stand

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
A FOREVER EVIL tie-in! Belle Reve has been turned to rubble and the inmates are on the loose! Alone, Amanda Waller must fight her way out and form a new Suicide Squad! Or is a new team already in place?

The Crime Syndicate has turned off the power to most of the Earth, but has left Belle Reve with power so that the prisoners could do what they wish. Amanda Waller, holds herself in a safe room and contacts Deadshot, and requests him to do one last mission. Make a team and retrieve a powerful weapon for her.

Deadshot invites Harley Quinn and Captain Boomerang to join him and the fly out to the Rocky Mountains. Meanwhile, back in Belle Reve, the Thinker, has the prisoner build a devise for him and the Syndicate. James Gordan Jr. learns of the Thinker's plan and makes his own.

Back in the Rocky Mountains, Warrant, Steel and The Unknown Soldier, meet up and plan on retrieving a weapon for Waller. They are soon joined by Powergirl and continue their assault on the military base.

Steel, Warrant and The Unknown Soldier, soon come across, Deadshot, Harley and Boomerang attempting to to steal the OMAC. The groups prepare to fight, unknown to them that the one group had been hired by Waller and the other has been hired by The Thinker, disguised as Waller.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Excuse the Mess...

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Superman discovers the shocking truth about Krypton...and the villain behind it all! "Tears for Krypton" part 3 of 3.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Tears For Krypton, Part 3 of 3

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Superboy faces a foe he cannot begin to beat! The battle will tear him apart and reveal the truth of what Dr. Psycho has been secretly planning all along!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Secrets and Origins

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
The battle between Batwoman and Batman begins here—it’s all been leading to this!

Note: This issue ends in a cliffhanger that is resolved in Batwoman Annual #1 - This Blood is Thick, Conclusion: Brothers and Sisters
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: This Blood is Thick: Plots

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: “The Big Burn” part one of five! Two-Face’s first epic in The New 52 sees Batman unraveling the mysterious connections between Harvey Dent’s life and the origin of Carrie Kelley!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Big Burn: First Strike

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Jason Todd now leads the League of Assassins against the Untitled and his former teammates. But the true power is within the Lazarus Pit in the City of Assassins. What will it unleash?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Shakedown

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: After the shocking events of issue #23, Wonder Woman’s life has changed forever…but what if she refuses to walk the path the gods—and her mentor—have laid out for her? A strange new era of WONDER WOMAN begins here!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: A Guilded Rage

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The Birds are up against impossible odds as Canary must free her suddenly alive husband, Kurt, from Regulus, while Batgirl and Strix infiltrate the Basilisk compound!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Together Again

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
The totems are dead, and Brother Blood rules The Red. Can Buddy reunite with his family in time to save life as we know it? Writer Jeff Lemire teams with superstar artist Rafael Albuquerque (AMERICAN VAMPIRE) for an epic new story that longtime fans and new readers alike will NOT want to miss!

After the events of last issue, Buddy Baker doubled over in pain and trapped in a cell with Mr. Hogue. Maxine is also in great pain but she is in the Red, with Socks, Shepard and animal crew of pirates.

Shepard senses something is wrong with the Totems and sends his bird to check it out. The bird then witnesses Brother Blood and the King of Limbs kill several of the other Totems, all the while the King of Limbs rants about how Brother Blood is the new Red Champion, and that all the other Totems are weak.

Meanwhile back in the real world, prison guards come to Animal Man's aide but Mr Hogue escapes by being pulled into the Red. Just then Animal Man's phone rings and it's Ellen, his wife, she is sobbing that Maxine is missing and she needs him help to find her.
Ellen doesn't know that Maxine is in the Red and upon learning the Totems are dead, Shepard and Sock are taking her to safety.

Meanwhile, The King of Limbs has brought Mr. Hogue and his Splinterflok into the Red to be Brother Blood's soldiers. Also Mr. Hogue reveals his plan to kill Animal Man, some of his members have taken control of the Hollywood Screen Awards and are planning on killing innocent men and women until Buddy Baker shows up.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Hollywood Babylon, Part 1 of 2

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Brainiac and Cyborg Superman fight for the fate of Kara Zor-El! And when the cosmic dust settles, wait till you see the secret behind the villains and their shocking connection to Supergirl!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Death Becomes Her

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: "LIGHTS OUT" part three! Enter The White Lantern! Pushed to the limit by Relic's assault, the loyalties of Hal, Kyle and the others are tested!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Lights Out, Part Three: Gods and Monsters

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Now that he's locked up in Arkham, Gotham City is safe from the threat of Clayface. But what led Clayface to become the monster that he is? The answers lie here.

Clayface is locked up in Arkham and Mogsy, the guy in the cell next to him, is his biggest fan. Mogsy begs Clayface to recite his old roles, which Clayface is happy to do.

Soon Karlo gets spooked by Scarecrow and tells Mogsy about how he used to be too normal and no one noticed him. He tried new clothing and acting but couldn't stand out of the crowd. He goes on to tell how he made a deal with the Penguin for some magic clay. The clay turned him into Clayface, but at first everything seemed to be going Karlo's way but then Penguin came to collect his debt. He had Clayface commit crimes for him and that cost Karlo his acting career and his life spiraled downward.

When Clayface finishes his story he realizes that Mogsy has passed away. After day of being depressed, he decided to break out and fakes an injury and when the doctors come in his cell to help he makes a crack and escapes.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Captive Audience

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Who is the Scourge of the Seven Seas?! All his life, Arthur’s been told that he is the King of the Seven Seas. But he’s about to learn exactly what that title means—and the dark power and legacy it carries with it. Is it possible for one man to rule every living thing in the ocean? Or is the King of the Seven Seas always doomed to die trying?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Death of a King, Chapter Six: Secret of the Seven Seas

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
A “Forever Evil” tie-in! THE JUSTICE LEAGUE IS DEAD! But who’s at the top of the food chain now? And what does BLACK ADAM have to say about it?

Note: The cover is an homage to the first issue of the series, by Jim Lee.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Forever Strong

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: A “Forever Evil” tie-in! THE JUSTICE LEAGUE DARK IS DEAD. Not even the JL Dark can escape the evil that’s invaded the Earth—except for John Constantine! But why has he alone survived? And will he try to stop the villains—or join them? Long live the NEW Justice League Dark!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Forever Evil: Blight - Tiny Evils

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: “LIGHTS OUT” part four! Can the Lanterns cooperate with each other long enough to defeat Relic? If Hal Jordan thought Guy Gardner was difficult before, just wait till he meets Guy Gardner—RED LANTERN!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Lights Out, Part Four: Blood Brothers

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Barry’s battle against the Reverse-Flash ends with major revelations and The Flash facing an impossible challenge!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Reverse, Part Five

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: This is the end of the line for Jonah Hex’s trip to modern day Gotham City! Is his future our past or a padded cell in Arkham Asylum?
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Justified

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: It’s time! Catwoman vs. The Joker’s Daughter deep in the Gotham Underground!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Down Under, Part 3; You Meet the Best People at Rock Bottom

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: “Psi War” comes to a shocking conclusion as one of the people closest to Superman becomes a casualty—and then, cometh the Oracle to tell Superman that Krypton lives once more!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Psi War, Part Three

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: As Forever Evil spreads across the world, where have the Teen Titans gone? Find out when they are and why the Titans definitely aren’t together!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Caught Up in Circles!

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
The stunning aftermath of Into the Grave has arrived!

His encounter with Kraven the Hunter forced the Scarlet Spider to make some immense sacrifices. Now Kaine has to make a choice...one that may see him leaving his new life forever.

Chris Yost, Erik Burnham and Carlo Barberi bring you the decisive moment in the life of The Scarlet Spider!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Hands Covered In Blood Part 1

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
TRAPPED! Alone on a strange world, the crew of the Lost Light struggle against an unknown enemy-but what does this have to do with SHOCKWAVE's master plan? Answer: everything. Meanwhile, OPTIMUS PRIME finds an old friend in the Dead Universe!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverCasey Coller1
SubSubscription CoverPhil Jimenez2
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Into the Abyss: Dark Cybertron Chapter 4

volume.name: The Transformers: More Than Meets the Eye

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
DARKEST HOURS Part 3 of 4: "Complications"

The birth of a new Goblin! The return of Cardiac! MJ's greatest fear!

And the one question everyone will be asking: "Who is THE SUPERIOR VENOM?!"

Good luck, Superior Spider-Man! You're gonna need it!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverHumberto Ramos1
VarVariant CoverStefano Caselli & Frank Martin2
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Darkest Hours, Part 3 of 4: Dark Embrace

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
UNDER FIRE! AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS unite to battle a common foe... but will it be enough to stop the DARK CYBERTRON prophecy from coming true? SHOCKWAVE's plan reaches fruition-while in the Dead Universe, secrets are revealed!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverCasey Coller1
SubSubscription CoverPhil Jimenez2
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Finest Hour: Dark Cybertron Chapter 5

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: As the year closes, Alfred looks back on the calendar of small events.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: The Grand Finale

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
"ROGUE PLANET" - Part 1 of 5

Captain America and Iron Man plan for the next version of the Avengers.

A runaway planet is on a collision course with Earth.

A visitor from the future helps save the day.

AVENGERS #24.NOW = AVENGERS #1 IN ALL-NEW MARVEL NOW!

List of covers and their creators:

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Proper Japanese Title: キミの傍に (Kimi no soba ni)

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 213: Searching for A.W. (Allen Walker) Hiding Someone (A.W（アレン・ウォーカー）をたずねて・秘める者 A.W. (Aren Wōkā) wo Tazunete Himeru Mono)
  • Chapter 214: Searching for A.W. (Allen Walker) Awakening (A.W（アレン・ウォーカー）をたずねて・目覚め A.W. (Aren Wōkā) wo Tazunete Mezame)
  • Chapter 215: Searching for A.W. (Allen Walker) By Your Side ( A.W（アレン・ウォーカー) をたずねて・キミの傍に A.W. (Aren Wōkā) wo Tazunete Kimi no Soba ni)
  • Chapter 216: Searching for A.W. (Allen Walker) Attack ( A.W（アレン・ウォーカー) をたずねて・襲撃 A.W. (Aren Wōkā) wo Tazunete Shūgeki)
  • Chapter 217: Searching for A.W. (Allen Walker) One Seat Empty (A.W（アレン・ウォーカー) をたずねて・One seat empty A.W. (Aren Wōkā) wo Tazunete One seat empty)
  • Chapter 218: Searching for A.W. (Allen Walker) 'D' (A.W（アレン・ウォーカー) をたずねて・『D』 A.W. (Aren Wōkā) wo Tazunete 『D』)
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: By Your Side

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: The Butler did it. Or more precisely, the butler's cousin. See what happens when Alfred's identical, criminal relative captures Batman's loyal servant and tries to take his place in Wayne Manor.
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Zelda's Great Escape!

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 208: I'm Alright
  • Chapter 209: You Can Do It!
  • Chapter 210: I Know
  • Chapter 211: See You
  • Chapter 212: Like Hell I'll Lose
  • Chapter 213: Shishi Hakuto
  • Chapter 214: I'm Looking Forward To It!
  • Chapter 215: Let's Do Our Best
  • Chapter 216: ... Sorry
  • Chapter 217: Let's Go
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Let's Go

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
In Astro Boy: His Highness Deadcross, Deadcross has kidnapped Astro's teacher! And Astro Boy has no idea what tortures his poor teacher is suffering, not even realizing Mustachio had followed him to Gravia! Will Astro Boy be able to help both the president of Gravia and his hapless teacher in time? Also included are Buddha, Black Jack, and the first chapter of Phoenix: Dawn.

Story Titles

  • Astro Boy: His Highness Deadcross Chapter Two
  • Buddha Part Two: Migaila Chapter Two
  • Phoenix: Dawn Chapter One
  • Black Jack: Pinoko's Challenge
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: Rookie has rewritten the 12 Days of Christmas, Rockhopper is telling corny jokes, and Herbert is up to his mean tricks in our brand new comic story!

Chapters

  • 207. The One That'll Die is You (死ぬのはてめーだ, Shinu no ha temē da)
  • 208. Furuichi Dies!!? (古市死す, Furuichi shisu)
  • 209. Tōhōshin(ki) (東邦神(姫), Tōhōshin(ki))
  • 210. 'Course Not That Sort of Thing (ねーよ そんなもん, Nēyo sonnamon)
  • 211. The Tōjō-sama of Tennis (テニスの東条様, Tenisu no Tōjō-sama)
  • 212. The Man That Does Not Match (似合わねー男, Niawanē otoko)
  • 213. Takamiya and Lucifer (鷹宮とルシファー, Takamiya to Rushifā)
  • 214. Blooming (開花, Kaika)
  • 215. Vanished Baby Beel (消えたベル坊, Kieta Berubō)
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Takamiya to Lucifer

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Ride.200: Yosou Guy (予想ガイ)
  • Ride.201: Hakogaku Zekken 6-ban (箱根学園ゼッケン６番)
  • Ride.202: Manami no Warai (真波の笑い)
  • Ride.203: Kaze (風)
  • Ride.204: Ippo Ippo (一歩一歩)
  • Ride.205: "Sohoku Megane" (「総北メガネ」)
  • Ride.206: Sakamichi Course Auto (坂道　コースアウト)
  • Ride.207: Kimaru!!! (決まる!!!)
  • Special Story: Yowamushi Pedal Tokubetsuhen Souhoku Jitensha Bu Bushitsu Tan (弱虫ペダル特別編　総北自転車部　部室譚)
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Vol. 24

2012-06-01|2013-12-30.description: As the leaves change colors, Riverdale prepares for autumn. That means school, football, and of course, raking leaves! Will Moose bring the Riverdale Bulldogs to victory? Is Dilton's leaf removal contraption too good to be true? And wait until you see who is crowned as Homecoming Queen! Check out this 111 page Digital Exclusive and FALL for fall!
2012-06-01|2013-12-30.name: Archie Fall Fun
